  • Method Details

    • runApp

      public void runApp(String[] args) throws IOException, Error
      Main loop function that run all program
      Parameters:
      args - - The arguments' sen to the program (command options, URL, filename)
      Throws:
      IOException - - Throw error if cannot close the BufferWriter to Main (rest of exceptions handled in that function).
      Error - - Same

    • loadDocument

      private org.jsoup.nodes.Document loadDocument(String url) throws BadURL, Error
      This function is called only once in order to load the Document that I will use to extract data from html
      Parameters:
      url - - The URL to load to the document
      Returns:
      The Document created
      Throws:
      BadURL - - If the URL is invalid (or malformed syntax or the URL doesn't consist html,or doesnt exist
      Error - - The address is fine, but all errors that can occurs for example during reading etc.

    • createOptionsList

      private ArrayList<OptionReader> createOptionsList(String typeCommands) throws InvalidCommand
      Create an array of interface of options according to the type commands given - using Factory.
      Parameters:
      typeCommands - - The type of commands that were given
      Returns:
      - List of OptionReader (interface)
      Throws:
      InvalidCommand - - Command invalid (bad syntax, missing arguments, to many args etc.)

    • registerAll

      private void registerAll()
      A function that register all basic options (if we want to add a new option, for example "p", we need to create a class "Paragraph" that implements "OptionReader" and add the line here: "Paragraph.register("p")"
